name: FPS Prototype (vahellis)
description:
This is just a learning project. I'm still learning and I didn't really spend much time working on this. I learned a lot of stuff working on this and I decided to upload it just for the sake of documenting it. Not much to play here, just a small test level for a small fps prototype.

Select "New Game" to play the first level. You can also select "Test levels" and select "Level 01" to play the playtesting level.

WASD - Movement

Left Mouse Button - Shoot

Space Bar - Jump

Control - Crouch

Left Shift - Sprint
